Sentencas: 4.5 mol% yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) deposit was prepared by atmospheric plasma spraying (APS) using an agglomerate-sintered YSZ powder.
Titulo: Microstructure development of plasma-sprayed yttria-stabilized zirconia and its effect on electrical conductivity

Sentencas: Two samples were continuously deposited at two spray distances of 80 mm and 90 mm without intermittence during spraying.
Titulo: Microstructure development of plasma-sprayed yttria-stabilized zirconia and its effect on electrical conductivity

Sentencas: The measurement showed that the ionic conductivity of the YSZ deposit at 1000 degrees C significantly decreased from 0.06 S/cm to 0.033 S/cm with increasing spray distance from 80 mm to 90 mm.
Titulo: Microstructure development of plasma-sprayed yttria-stabilized zirconia and its effect on electrical conductivity

Sentencas: The deposit microstructure exhibited distinct interfaces between consecutive pass layers in the deposit sprayed at long spray distance.
Titulo: Microstructure development of plasma-sprayed yttria-stabilized zirconia and its effect on electrical conductivity

Sentencas: The decrease of ionic conductivity can be ascribed to change of the bonding ratio between consecutive passes resulting from decrease of deposition temperature with the increase of spray distance.
Titulo: Microstructure development of plasma-sprayed yttria-stabilized zirconia and its effect on electrical conductivity
Microstructure development of plasma-sprayed yttria-stabilized zirconia and its effect on electrical conductivity
